Text: Well, I somewhat succeeded in getting my site posted without it being removed, though the periods were removed. It shouldn't be too hard to find out where the two periods go though. I'll be likely more responsive to questions if you ask there. Also, I'll be posting more updates and other methods of downloading there. These torrents are mostly for people who don't have stable enough connections.

During the next few days, I'll be having my computer shutting off and on for various reasons. Hopefully there will be a few more seeders. At that time, I'll also stop devoting as much of my upload bandwidth to this particular torrent as well.
You'll have a permanent seeder here, as soon as this and volume 1 are finished. x: I'm excited; I've seen the footage but I'm still waiting to buy them myself.
